Dimension Class Reference

Range of subscript values for one dimension of an array type. More...

Expression * lowBound

Expression * highBound
 Hight bound of array.

Detailed Description

Range of subscript values for one dimension of an array type.

C++

  • example: 
    int p;  // highBound = "4", lowBound remains unset as default because low bound is 0 (default value)

Pascal

  • example: 
    var p: array of integer;    { lowBound = "1", highBound = "4" }
